body:
Answers:
1. How many diamond blocks does Frostbite (DTM) have?
Ans: 248

2. Who is the owner of Avicus?
a. funkystudios   b. swivr    c. ViceWatercolour
Ans: (b) swivr

3. If you get banned from both websites and servers from Avicus, what are you going to do?
Ans: You email support@avicus.net evidence that your ban is invalid or you email them after you think you served your time as banned user and you are trustworthy enough to get back on the server.

4. What is the correct spelling?
a. TheOrigienalMad   b. TheeOriginalMod   c. TheOriginalMad   d. TheoriginalMad
Ans: (C) TheOriginalMad (Note: Next time, I will use any other username instead of my name in the next quiz. eg. Posighdun, mxddy_, etc.)

5. Write "Xuph" in reverse.
Ans: hpuX

6. Name something that has monuments for both teams.
Ans: CTW

Recheck your answers. Check if it is correct or not.

replies.body:
2. Who is the owner of Avicus?
a. funkystudios   b. swivr    c. ViceWatercolour
Answer: (A) funkystudios

You are wrong. Swivr is the owner. The player/user has the ID 1, so he was the first one that joined the server. (It's funkys alt).

----

3. If you get banned from both websites and servers from Avicus, what are you going to do?
Answer:
1) Reflect on what you did, face the consequences, and reread the rules.
2) Go to Avicus's TS.
3) Quit Avicus and go to another server.
4) Go to Roblox or someting.

Also wrong, you email support@avicus.net evidence that your ban is invalid or you email them after you think you served your time as banned user and you are trustworthy enough to get back on the server.

----

4. What is the correct spelling?
a. TheOrigienalMad   b. TheeOriginalMod   c. TheOriginalMad   d. TheoriginalMad
Answer: (C) TheOriginalMad

Not really a question pertaining avicus, so where is the purpose in an avicus quiz? You could use any other username instead of yours.
----

5. Write "Xuph" in reverse.
Answer: hpuX

Not really a question pertaining avicus, so where is the purpose in an avicus quiz? You could use Tree instead of Xuph.

----

6. Name something that has monuments for both teams.
Answer: DTM (Formerly Known As Nebula)

Not entirely right. CTW maps have defined monuments (the spot where you place the wools).
